mapper.sql: appID, appTypeID, appName, url, iconStyle, sortNum, isCurrent, isDelete, theNote
mapper.select:
select a.appID as appID,a.appTypeID as appTypeID, b.appTypeName as appTypeName, a.appName as appName, a.url as url,a.iconStyle as iconStyle, a.sortNum as sortNum,a.isDelete as isDelete,a.isCurrent as isCurrent, a.theNote as theNote from permission_app a inner join sys_role_appType b on a.appTypeID = b.appTypeID
a.isDelete=1 and b.isDelete = 1
and a.appName like '%${appName}%'
order by a.sortNum desc
select * from permission_app where isDelete = 1 and appID = #{appID ,jdbcType=INTEGER}
